==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
[[天]] ([[天生]] - natural) + [[常]] ([[五常]] - the five unchanging relationships)
: According to traditional [[Confucianism]], there were five kinds of human relationships ([[五常]]) which followed natural ([[天生]]) laws and were unchanging:
:# ruler and subject ([[君臣]])
:# father and son ([[父子]])
:# husband and wife ([[夫婦]])
:# older brother and younger brother ([[兄弟]])
:# friends ([[朋友]])
